FuncDef:
The apply preferred-value command sets the preferred value for BGP routes.
The undo apply preferred-value command cancels the configuration. The apply preferred-value command sets the preferred value for BGP routes. The undo apply preferred-value command cancels the configuration. By default, the preferred value of BGP routes is not set.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the preferred value of BGP routes. In route selection, the BGP route with the largest preferred value is preferred.
The value is an integer in the range from 0 to 65535.

ExtraInfo: The preferred value is a proprietary attribute of BGP. You can use the apply preferred-value command to set the preferred value for a BGP route in the import policy.
